title: Kenya to confront Russia over 'unacceptable' use of its nationals in combat
summary_full: Nairobi says it has shut down illegal recruiters and will urge Moscow to sign a deal banning conscription.
summary_public: Nairobi says it has shut down illegal recruiters and will urge Moscow to sign a deal banning conscription.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Kenya to confront Russia over 'unacceptable' use of its nationals
